# Book Covers

Upload your book cover images here with the following filenames:

- `book1.jpg` - Shadows of the Port (The Dark Chronicles - Book One)
- `book2.jpg` - Blood on the Cobblestones (The Dark Chronicles - Book Two)  
- `book3.jpg` - The Final Bell Tolls (The Dark Chronicles - Book Three)

## Image Guidelines

- **Format:** JPG or PNG
- **Aspect Ratio:** 2:3 (portrait)
- **Recommended Size:** At least 800x1200px for best quality
- **File Size:** Optimize for web (under 500KB recommended)

## How to Upload

Simply drag and drop your cover images into this `public/covers/` directory with the exact filenames listed above. The website will automatically display them once uploaded.
